name: Planks
description:
A local village near you has burnt down and you have been given the job as a lumberjack to rebuild the village. You do this by cutting down trees to make money and sawmill them into planks which can be sold and also be used to rebuild the houses. With the money you get you can purchase things to unlock new biomes, get different kinds of saplings, better axes, chainsaws, and much more.

Make logs in to planks in the Sawmill.

Rebuild the burnt down houses.

Replant trees to keep making money.
